Dec, 09, 2024

Finishing My Pricing Tool, Doing More Local SEO For My Website, Learning Foreground Tool in GIMP

Made My Web Pricing Tool Functional

I started the process of putting together a website pricing tool.The goal is to give people intrested in a starting a website an estimate of how much their project is going to cost. Now that I'm finished with the fucntional part I'll be focusing on trying to make this tool stand out and be more engaing through design and maybe even animatio.

Adding Content I Wrote A Year Ago To This Website

Something else I did this week was add pages and content I had written about a year ago to this website. The information in those web pages is web service related content targeting La Habra, California and cities near by. My goal with these pages and as a website designer and developer is to get more people in my area intrested in web related technologies.

Crawled On My Website

During the process of transfering over the conetnt from my past website I was also learning how to install a sitemap on an 11ty website. I made the mistake of not sandboxing all the old files in a new folder and while implementing the sitemap script 11ty generated url's for all the pages in my website and Google crawled all the pages I my website including the pages that weren't exactly ready to be published. The upside to this little accident is I got some keyword information without really even trying.

Learning How To Use The Foreground Tool in GIMP

One of the more exciting things I did this week is learn how to use the foreground tool in GIMP. The reasons I spent a couple hours learning how to use this tool is because I've been trying to step my website design skills up learning how to better cut objects out of images is going to do just that.

Cutting Out Hair

Don't get me wrong I know the basics of croping obejcts but one thing that's really been bothering me is hair. Hair in images is always hard to isolate and crop around because of how frizzy and fine it is. This I've realized, has kept me from using people in my designs. I don't know if you know this but people seeing other people in images creates a better sense of trust in the visitor, shocking I now.

Ruben Gutierrez
